participant_1.background:
I've seen elephants on my travels, and they are amazing creatures.
I love to create, whether it's for work or for my own enjoyment.
I love the taste of mangoes, and they are a great source of vitamins and nutrients.
I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con.
i enjoy taking walks.

participant_2.background:
My mother is a little old-fashioned and worries about my choice of career, but my dad is proud of my success.
i do not like working long hours.
i brew my own beer.
i have woman calling me all the time.
I keep secrets from my parents.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just got back from Comic Con. I had a lot of fun dressing up as a character from my favorite video game.
That's awesome! I've never been to Comic Con, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It was! I got to meet a lot of really cool people and see some amazing costumes.
That sounds like a great time. I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to brew my own beer, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never brewed my own beer, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's really easy to do! You can find a lot of great recipes online.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! It's always fun to meet new people who share your interests.
I agree! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! Maybe we can meet up at Comic Con next year?
That would be great! I'll keep an eye out for you
